Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2009 07:40PM joanne51 wrote: Like Christl I am also doing Taxol weekly.  I have already done 10, #11 is this Friday.  My hair starting falling out on day 13.  I had my husband cut it really short cause I could not stand it.  Right now I hardly have any left at all (very ugly).  I have been wearing my wig to work and most nights I too wear a sleep cap.  The first 6 treatments for me were actually pretty easy, I worked every day, had some tingling in my hands and feet but nothing I could not handle.  After #6 it seemed like it really hit me hard.  I am so sick of chemo already and I still have 4 FEC's to go after Taxol.  My whole body aches, I have no energy and my fingers are so sore - feels like I slammed them in a door or something.  I just keep telling myself, 2 more to go and then maybe things will improve. I have worked everyday but one (I told myself I needed a break) and my chemo nurse says actually it helps when you work all the time.  I don't move as fast as I used to but I'm hanging in there.  Good luck and come back here for any questions, someone will know the answer.  These girls are a wealth of information. Joanne
Posts.Title: what are side effects of taxol shinypenny shinypenny
